title: TRYHARD LUCIANS EVERYWHERE!
body:
WOAH LOOK AT ME  IM GOSU IM DASHING AROUND LIKE A SPAZTIC C*NT    {{champion:236}} 

Do you want me to clap my hands? Lucian isnt even hard u know so stop being sweaty in normals and flex.

replies.body: U should put less salt in ur spaghetti next time :)

Bruh all you need to stop him is a half decent top laner (i.e. not me) and wait for everyone to scale up to late game, so that your tank is virtually unkillable and your mage/assassin can just blow him to bits.
yo but dont you have go play lucian like that and get  a kill/cs advantage in the early game or risk being useless
Gotta love this guy in ranked tho. I'm losing like one game out of every five. Freelo.
